channel.title: Pipe command so I can post errors here
channel.description:
Hello.
A newbie here. I'm getting some errors in whonix. How can I export the output to a file that I can read outside of virtual box.
Thank you.

item.title: Pipe command so I can post errors here
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Or using the host to make screenshots would work as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Pipe command so I can post errors here

item.title: Pipe command so I can post errors here
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There is no great answer to this. Best we got is https://www.whonix.org/wiki/File_Transfer and https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox_Guest_Additions (clipboard sharing).

Read full topic
item.source: Pipe command so I can post errors here
